Posted By: Jo_Aldo (11/28/2010 8:42:14 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Based on the artwork, this really ought to be an Elemental **Treefolk**. That said, I actually got one of these in a pack of Legends back in 1994 (showing my age, here). Legends was in such high demand when it first came out and the set had a very low print run. So nearly every store only received a partial shipment (or none at all). I did find a store in D.C. selling them for $8/pack only 2 weeks after the set was released. I bought eight packs for $64 -- the store limit. I could've gotten just about any other rare and been happy. But no... I was destined to receive a Wood Elemental.  
  
Oh, and I also got a [Mold Demon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mold Demon) and an [Akron Legionnaire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Akron Legionnaire). Yep... my luck was just that good.
posts.html:
Based on the artwork, this really ought to be an Elemental Treefolk. That said, I actually got one of these in a pack of Legends back in 1994 (showing my age, here). Legends was in such high demand when it first came out and the set had a very low print run. So nearly every store only received a partial shipment (or none at all). I did find a store in D.C. selling them for $8/pack only 2 weeks after the set was released. I bought eight packs for $64 -- the store limit. I could've gotten just about any other rare and been happy. But no... I was destined to receive a Wood Elemental.

Oh, and I also got a Mold Demon and an Akron Legionnaire. Yep... my luck was just that good.
